Posts.Content: Good luck Stormy! Reaching over your head or behind you will be hard.  A baggy T-shirt is fine but a tight T would be impossible. A low v-neck is easier to get on than a tight T-shirt because you can stretch the shoulders apart as you put it on.  I was given a gown to wear while in the hospital, which does up at the back. It doesn't cover your bum but keeps you decent as long as you stay in bed.
